Package com.servingxml.components.string

Provides classes that implement the sx:stringable based components.

See:

Interface Summary
Stringable The Stringable defines an interface for creating a string.
StringFactory A StringFactory defines an interface for creating a string.

Provides classes that implement the sx:stringable based components.
